channel.title: Eclipse 639 Returns - [100% SUMMONING]
channel.description:
[size=10pt][b]Hey guys. Figured it was about time I started a new project thread for Eclipse. This thread will cover a wide range of server based things. Such as Server Development (General), Upcoming updates, Unique Features, And Current Development Team/Positions.[/b][/size]
[size=14pt]MAJOR UPDATE: WE HAVE SUMMONING NOW! PICS BELOW![/size] [img]http://eclipse639.com/summoning.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/BoB.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/pak.png[/img]
[i][u][b]Please remember this is just the beginning of this thread, it is including older pictures and will be updated when I have the time[/b][/u][/i]
[b][u]To Start, Some Features the server currently has:[/u][/b] Fixed ALL Dupes in server Clan wars as SafePK Summoning Base (Including working BoB, Steel Titans, and some Pouch Creation) Soul Wars (In-Progress But not going to be finished anytime soon) Skeletal Horrors Nex [100% Nex comes in January] Nex currently uses all attack styles, and has proper bonuses Economy
====================================================================================================================================
Upcoming Features: Perfect Timers 100% Special Attacks on ALL weapons Summoning Finished Dungeoneering Base PvP Token/Shop System Much More To Come Aswell...
================================================================================================================================
Skill's and Skill Features:
[b][img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100704154903/runescape/images/e/ef/CombatSwords.PNG[/img]Melee 99.9% Perfect weapon timers. Correct max-hit formula. Every weapon’s special attack perfected. Equipment requirements. Proper animations for every weapon. Weapon poison can be used on every poison-able weapon. Poisoning deals damage overtime unless healed with pot. [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091219211543/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img]Magic Perfect Modern magics with Autocasting. Perfect Ancient Magiks with Autocasting. Perfect Lunar magics. Perfect Alch, Enchant, and Charge. Slayer spell and God spells work. Freezing and Stat drain spells all have proper effects. [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205042556/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img]Range Projectiles (Obsidian rings, darts, thrown-axe) all work. All Bows (Including Crystal Bow, Seercull, etc.) function properly. All Crossbow’s with proper effects. Every bow special attack with proper effects. Poisoned Arrows and Throwing weapons function perfectly. Crystal, magic bows ect not firing any type of bolt. [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091215022527/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img]Prayer Bone Burying. Dragon bones only at the moment. Plan to add full Prayer shop soon!. Bones on Alter for 2x EXP. Smite reduces opponents prayer by 25% of your damage. All prayers Function Perfectly (YES This means protect item aswell!) All other prayers (including Turmoil) work perfect. [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img]Fishing All Fish may be caught in the correct area with the correct equipment. (45% DONE) Small/Big Nets fully functional. (DONE) Harpoon fully functional. (DONE) Lobster Pot fully functional. (DONE) Level affects what you catch and the rate at which it is caught. (65% DONE) Perfect Fishing Guild for advanced Fisherman. (Unstarted) Correct fishing spot requirements. (50% Done) [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png[/img]Woodcutting Trees now turn to stumps after all the logs have been cut. The number of logs a tree holds is determined randomly from an array of reasonable amount values. Bird Nests now fall from trees and can be searched for valuable seeds and jewelery. Tree respawns vary based on the tree’s output value. Every tree type choppable with proper log output and level requirements. Correct axe level requirements. [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img]Fletching Arrow shaft, shortbow, longbow fletching done via Interface. Arrow making (feather + shaft=headless arrow, headless arrow + arrowtip=arrow). Crossbow and bolt assembly. Bow stringing. [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img]Firemaking All logs have proper requirements to be lit. All logs can be burned. Colored lighters change fire color. All fires turn to ashes on correct timers. All players can see fires, and may cook food on them. Player walking in one direction after lighting a log (clipped). [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103053740/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img]RuneCrafting Mage of Zamorak teleports players to Abyss. Every altar and portal works. Fully function small, medium and large sized pouches. Runecraft multiplier effect is perfect. Use Rune ess to make basic runes and Pure ess to make advanced runes. Every rune added besides Astral. [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png[/img]Thieving Pickpocketing and stall thieving. Various items (fish,cakes) in correct stalls rather than coins. Npc’s may catch you stealing from them and attack you. Level affects how often you’re caught whilst stealing. [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043728/runescape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img]Cooking Most cook-able foods configured to cook properly on a range or fire. Cooking level effects burn rate. Cooking gauntlets reduce burn rate. All cooking level requirements complete.
============================================================================================================================
And Some Pics of server [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/nex3.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/nex2.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/nex4.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/nex.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/nexchaotic.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/pk2.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/pk.png[/img] [img]http://i1222.photobucket.com/albums/dd483/eclipse639/skele.png[/img] [img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/6500/autocast.png[/img] [img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/2614/clanchat.png[/img] [img]http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/4029/overloadsu.png[/img] [img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/7417/tabsps.png[/img] [img]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/1377/pricecheckerv.png[/img] [img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/7551/teleporttabs.png[/img] [img]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/1523/bandosnpc.png[/img] [img]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/4150/corpw.png[/img] [img]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/674/frostie.png[/img] [img]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/4373/gnomecourse.png[/img] [img]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/5630/hunteri.png[/img] [img]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/8706/icestryk.png[/img]

item.title: Eclipse 639 Returns - [100% SUMMONING]
item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

[size=10pt]Hey guys. Figured it was about time I started a new project thread for Eclipse.
This thread will cover a wide range of server based things. Such as Server Development (General), Upcoming updates, Unique Features, And Current Development Team/Positions.[/size]

[size=14pt]MAJOR UPDATE: WE HAVE SUMMONING NOW! PICS BELOW![/size]


Please remember this is just the beginning of this thread, it is including older pictures and will be updated when I have the time

To Start, Some Features the server currently has:
Fixed ALL Dupes in server
Clan wars as SafePK
Summoning Base (Including working BoB, Steel Titans, and some Pouch Creation)
Soul Wars (In-Progress But not going to be finished anytime soon)
Skeletal Horrors
Nex [100% Nex comes in January] Nex currently uses all attack styles, and has proper bonuses
Economy

====================================================================================================================================

Upcoming Features:
Perfect Timers
100% Special Attacks on ALL weapons
Summoning Finished
Dungeoneering Base
PvP Token/Shop System
Much More To Come Aswell…

================================================================================================================================

Skill’s and Skill Features:

[b]Melee
99.9% Perfect weapon timers.
Correct max-hit formula.
Every weapon’s special attack perfected.
Equipment requirements.
Proper animations for every weapon.
Weapon poison can be used on every poison-able weapon.
Poisoning deals damage overtime unless healed with pot.
Magic
Perfect Modern magics with Autocasting.
Perfect Ancient Magiks with Autocasting.
Perfect Lunar magics.
Perfect Alch, Enchant, and Charge.
Slayer spell and God spells work.
Freezing and Stat drain spells all have proper effects.
Range
Projectiles (Obsidian rings, darts, thrown-axe) all work.
All Bows (Including Crystal Bow, Seercull, etc.) function properly.
All Crossbow’s with proper effects.
Every bow special attack with proper effects.
Poisoned Arrows and Throwing weapons function perfectly.
Crystal, magic bows ect not firing any type of bolt.
Prayer
Bone Burying.
Dragon bones only at the moment. Plan to add full Prayer shop soon!.
Bones on Alter for 2x EXP.
Smite reduces opponents prayer by 25% of your damage.
All prayers Function Perfectly (YES This means protect item aswell!)
All other prayers (including Turmoil) work perfect.
Fishing
All Fish may be caught in the correct area with the correct equipment. (45% DONE)
Small/Big Nets fully functional. (DONE)
Harpoon fully functional. (DONE)
Lobster Pot fully functional. (DONE)
Level affects what you catch and the rate at which it is caught. (65% DONE)
Perfect Fishing Guild for advanced Fisherman. (Unstarted)
Correct fishing spot requirements. (50% Done)
Woodcutting
Trees now turn to stumps after all the logs have been cut.
The number of logs a tree holds is determined randomly from an array of reasonable amount values.
Bird Nests now fall from trees and can be searched for valuable seeds and jewelery.
Tree respawns vary based on the tree’s output value.
Every tree type choppable with proper log output and level requirements.
Correct axe level requirements.
Fletching
Arrow shaft, shortbow, longbow fletching done via Interface.
Arrow making (feather + shaft=headless arrow, headless arrow + arrowtip=arrow).
Crossbow and bolt assembly.
Bow stringing.
Firemaking
All logs have proper requirements to be lit.
All logs can be burned.
Colored lighters change fire color.
All fires turn to ashes on correct timers.
All players can see fires, and may cook food on them.
Player walking in one direction after lighting a log (clipped).
RuneCrafting
Mage of Zamorak teleports players to Abyss.
Every altar and portal works.
Fully function small, medium and large sized pouches.
Runecraft multiplier effect is perfect.
Use Rune ess to make basic runes and Pure ess to make advanced runes.
Every rune added besides Astral.
Thieving
Pickpocketing and stall thieving.
Various items (fish,cakes) in correct stalls rather than coins.
Npc’s may catch you stealing from them and attack you.
Level affects how often you’re caught whilst stealing.
Cooking
Most cook-able foods configured to cook properly on a range or fire.
Cooking level effects burn rate.
Cooking gauntlets reduce burn rate.
All cooking level requirements complete.

============================================================================================================================

And Some Pics of server



















Read full topic
